title: US Bank to Buy BTIG for Up to $1 Billion in Trading Push
description: Stephen Philipson, U.S. Bancorp Vice Chair and Head of Wealth, Corporate, Commercial, and Institutional Banking, discusses the firm’s deal to buy BTIG. He tells Romaine Bostick on “The Close” that the acquisition is a natural step in U.S. Bancorp’s evolution. (Source: Bloomberg)
